== Kadvai (565703) ==

Kadvai is a village in the [[Sangameshwar]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 1475.13 hectares and harbouring 1127 households with total population of 5008 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chiplun]] is at a distance of 37 km. Male population is 2398 and female population is 2610. Scheduled Caste Population is 68 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3. Census Location Code of the village is 565703<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
